channel.title: Firmware on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Firmware on SoftLayer API

item.title: Update Firmware on a Bare Metal Server
item.description: In the following example we are updating the firmware for the IPMI, BIOS, Hard Drives, and Raid Controller on our Bare Metal Server with ID 12345. We can toggle the specific items we want updated by setting the values to False (Do not update firmware) or True (Do update firmware). import SoftLayer client = SoftLayer.Client() mgr = SoftLayer.HardwareManager(client) result = mgr.
